title: Champagne Salad
directions: In a large bowl, cream together the cream cheese and sugar.  Fold in the pineapple, whipped topping and strawberries and mix well.  Stir in bananas and walnuts.
Freeze for 4 to 6 hours or overnight.  Remove from freezer 1 to 2 hours before serving.  Enjoy!
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
